Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SubSceneController

Class LocalStationController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SubSceneController.LocalStationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
StationListener, Listener, SetupListener, UI
public class LocalStationController extends GUIController implements StationListener, SetupListener
A sub-scene controller. Manges how GUI show the station of a player: card picking, card placing and errors.

  • Constructor Details

    • LocalStationController

      public LocalStationController(GUIController controller, String nickOwner)

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the sub-scene for local station of the owner player.

    • initializePawns

      private void initializePawns()
      Initializes pawn image for the owner player. If player hasn't still chosen its color, then nothing is showed. If player is first player, it shows, also, black pawn.

    • initializeCards

      private void initializeCards()
      For the owner player (nickOwner equals ClientController.getNickname()) displays the chosen GoalCard, otherwise nothing. Then displays cards in hand: for owner player, it makes them draggable and swappable; for others displays only back side.

    • checkStackPaneContainsImage

      private void checkStackPaneContainsImage(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouse)
      Checks whether centerPane contains mouse.
      If mouse is inside, and it is dragging a card (draggedCard != null) then draggedCard is resized to the dimension of the cards inside centerPane.
      If mouse is outside centerPane and draggedCard != null then draggedCard is resized to the dimensions of cards in hand.
      Parameters:
      mouse - a MouseEvent containing coords of mouse

    • makeCardDraggable

      private void makeCardDraggable(javafx.scene.Node node)

    • factoryUnswappableCard

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView factoryUnswappableCard(Symbol symbol, PlayableCardType type)
      Factory method for unswappable cards. They are represented as ImageView with both height and width property bounded to stage current width and height
      Parameters:
      symbol - the Symbol of the card
      type - the PlayableCardType of the card
      Returns:
      an ImageView describing the unswappable card

    • initializeGameArea

      private void initializeGameArea()
      Initializes game area (e.g. centerPane containing current game (placed cards) of the owner player. It builds also buttons for rescaling and centering images inside centerPane.

    • pawnFactory

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView pawnFactory(String name)
      Factory method for pawns
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Color to get the pawn
      Returns:
      the ImageView of the corresponding pawn.

    • buildCardGrid

      public void buildCardGrid(List<Tuple<PlayableCard,Tuple<Integer,Integer>>> placedCardSequence)

    • clipCardImage

      private void clipCardImage(javafx.scene.image.ImageView cardImage)
      Clips the by a Rectangle with rounded corners.
      Parameters:
      cardImage - the ImageView to be clipped.

    • makeGridPaneDraggable

      private void makeGridPaneDraggable()
      Makes cardGrid draggable inside centerPane. Users with mouse can move cardGrid around centerPane

    • makeCenterPaneScrollable

      private void makeCenterPaneScrollable()
      Makes cardGrid and centerPane scrollable. Users with mouse's scroll can zoom in and zoom out in cardGrid. At max, scale can be 2; at min, can be 0.25

    • notify

      public void notify(SetupEvent type)
      Used to notify LocalStationController about SetupEvent. Rebuilds the station view.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface SetupListener
      Parameters:
      type - a SetupEvent describing the type of the event

    • notify

      public void notify(SetupEvent type, String error)
      Used to notify LocalStationController about errors concerning SetupEvent. Currently not used.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface SetupListener
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the error
      error - a String description of the error

    • notify

      public void notify(PersonalStation localStationPlayer)
      Used to notify LocalStationController about PersonalStation updates. Rebuilds the station view.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface StationListener
      Parameters:
      localStationPlayer - is the PersonalStation that has changed

    • notify

      public void notify(OtherStation otherStation)
      Used to notify LocalStationController about OtherStation updates. Rebuilds the station view.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface StationListener
      Parameters:
      otherStation - is the OtherStation that has changed

    • notifyErrorStation

      public void notifyErrorStation(String... varArgs)
      Used to notify LocalStationController about errors concerning LocalStationPlayer Does not rebuild the station view. Displays a drop shadowed rectangle in the position where user has placed the invalid card.
      Specified by:
      notifyErrorStation in interface StationListener
      Parameters:
      varArgs - variable arguments describing the error
